Read SV TSV

Source: R/sv.R
read_sv_tsv.Rd

Reads the Manta TSV file output by umccrise.

read_sv_tsv(x)

Arguments

x

Path to manta.tsv output by umccrise.

Value

A tibble corresponding to the input TSV file.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/umccrise/sv/manta.tsv", package = "gpgr")
(sv <- read_sv_tsv(x))

#> # A tibble: 58 x 22
#>    caller sample chrom  start    end svtype split_read_supp… paired_support_…
